Petaluma.Lagunitas Brewing Company:
The Lagunitas Brewing Company is a brewery founded in 1993 in Lagunitas, California.
The company is completely owned by Heineken International,  and it is known for iconoclastic interpretations of traditional beer styles, and irreverent descriptive text and stories on its packaging.
Lagunitas Brewing was the fifth top selling craft brewery in the US in 2013.
